content:
I think I'll start by exploring the libraries and resources you mentioned, and see how I can apply them to my specific use case. I'm interested in automating the process of creating visualizations for customer behavior data, such as churn prediction and customer segmentation. I've heard that deep learning can be used to generate interactive visualizations, which would be really valuable for our team.

By the way, I was also thinking about my Netflix screen time tracking, and I realized that I spent around 10 hours last month watching documentaries, which is a bit more than I expected. I'm glad I can track it now, and maybe I'll try to reduce my screen time in the coming months.
